abstract: Kenyan military sends hundreds of troops into Somalia to battle Shabab militant group, becoming latest East African country to be dragged into Somalia's intractable anarchy.
snippet: Kenya’s military stormed into Somalia on Sunday, sending hundreds of troops to battle the Shabab militant group.
lead_paragraph: Kenya’s military stormed into Somalia on Sunday, sending hundreds of troops to battle the Shabab militant group.

headline.main: Kenyan Forces Enter Somalia to Battle Militants
headline.print_headline: Kenya Enters Somalia Fray To Confront Insurgents
headline.seo: Kenyan Forces Enter Somalia to Fight Shabab militants
